name: ITEM ADVENTURE
description:
Item Adventure is an arcade-feeling platform game made by Calceto Studios, a group of dev students.

Flip the story

The Hero is the Villain and the items are the protagonists of the story.

Cryptocoin is a regular coin who lives peacefully next to his friend Cryptobro until one day, a giant creepy Hero takes him away. Cryptocoin now travels around the world to rescue his friend and all the other classic video game Items.

Flip the game

Yeah, you navigate the level from right to left. You must survive across the different sections and rescue the item waiting for you at the end. 

But, be aware, the Hero will try to catch you.

Good old times

Replicate the feeling of an old arcade game machine is one of the Game Pillars. 

Simple movement mechanics, 2 actions and an awesome leaderboard to top. 

And, of course, you'll need Pesetas to continue the game if you die.
